      • getServerTransportFactory

        protected org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportFactory getServerTransportFactory()
                                                                           throws IOException
        クラスからコピーされた説明: SaslTransportPlugin

        All subclass must implement this method

        定義:
        getServerTransportFactory クラス内 SaslTransportPlugin
        戻り値:
        server transport factory
        例外:
        IOException

      • connect

        public org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport connect(org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport transport,
                                                      String serverHost,
                                                      String asUser)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ITransportPlugin

        Connect to the specified server via framed transport

        パラメータ:
        transport - The underlying Thrift transport.
        serverHost - server host
        asUser - the user as which the connection should be established, and all the subsequent actions should be executed. Only applicable when using secure storm cluster. A null/blank value here will just indicate to use the logged in user.
        例外:
        IOException
        org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException
